_header: Why should man doubtfully questions make
_description: On faith and reason — twenty-nine quatrains

VandADyce45.First Lines:
Whye shulde man dowtefully questyons make& stande to reason
                    & faythe forsake…
VandADyce45.Last Lines:
…that chryste maye increase owre faythethat charite in vs do
                    notte dekayegod grawnte thys in deadeffinis X wynton
VandADyce45.Attributed Title:
The wonderfull workes & power of god wherein euery christian maye
                    learne to geve place vnto ffaythe (f. 25v)
